Product_Name: Amazon Basics 3-Blade Motion Sphere Razor for Men with Dual Lubrication, Handle & 2 Cartridges, Cartridges Fit Amazon Basics Razor Handles only, 3 Piece Set, Black (Previously Solimo)
AI_Text: Customers like the smoothness of the razor blade cartridge. They say the lubricating strips give them smooth control while shaving. They are also satisfied with performance, and value. However, some customers have mixed opinions on sharpness, quality, comfort, handle, and durability.
Description: MotionSphere multi axis pivot designed to follow the contours of your face
Packaging may vary from images shown. This was previously a Solimo product and is now a part of the Amazon Basics brand. The product is the exact same formulation, size and quality.
Includes one Amazon Basics 3-Blade MotionSphere Razor for Men and two refill cartridges
Hypoallergenic lubricating strips with Vitamin E
To load refill cartridge, push razor handle into a cartridge as it sits in the dispenser until it clicks
